website_summaries.verdict: A low-cost sheath made of thick, attractive basket-weave leather.
cons: There are a few compromises related to cost, such as dried out leather and questionable fit for some knives

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good sheath
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a knife of my grandfathers that I have cleaned up. It's original case was shot, and I was looking for an inexpensive sheath that would fit the knife. The case fits up to 1 1/4 in. blade width and mine is one 1 in. so there is a tad of play, but nothing really noticeable. I am a rancher and cowboy so I know good leather when I see it, and this is decent. My suggestion is first thing, soak it in neatsfoot oil, then place your knife in and latch it. Over all I'm happy with it and I would say good bang for your buck. P.s. wife's account.
customer_reviews.author: Faith Anderson

customer_reviews.title: For the money, a very nice product.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for a 5" Gerber Prodigy. Rubbed it down with hair conditioner and wet the handle strap to stretch. Knife fits like a glove, slides in smooth and straps in nicely. For the money , this is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Unreal price
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a knife I'd put together from a Condor Bushlore blade blank. One reviewer said they'd applied neatsfoot oil to theirs, and this seemed like a good idea so I did the same. The strap that goes around the handle was pretty tight at first - actually a little too tight - but it stretched out to perfect in a few days. I also hammered a couple of the rivets down a little flatter. I have zero complaints about this sheath, and don't know how it could possibly be made and sold for this price.
customer_reviews.author: SuperCatMonkey

customer_reviews.title: It fits my Morakniv Companion. Nice Sheath.
customer_reviews.text: It fits with my Morakniv Companion Fixed Blade knife that has a 4.1-inch blade. If you want, you can find that knife to use as a basic idea of what the sheath fits with, here-->
customer_reviews.author: LaCroix

customer_reviews.title: A good sheath for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I got this in the mail today for my Ka-Bar BK-16 ( specs link here  ) and I have no complaints. Construction is solid with both stitching and rivets holding it together and that makes it easy to modify if you have an unusual knife size as I do. I cut off the tip right after the 3rd rivet, sanded down the ends to make it look presentable, and then seared it with hot metal to darken and seal the leather. You can't tell I did anything to it unless you are inspecting it and the mod took me less than 20 minutes to do. If I ever need to replace a sheath again this will be my first stop.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice,would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: This is a fine sheath, sturdy, firm, and well made in Mexico as they are noted in my life, excellent in leather and silver products, among a group of other products. i highly recommend what ever blade size of knife you have get a sheath 1 inch longer as they have these in 3 sizes. i bought this for a 4 inch blade, and it fits the bill perfect. The snap is large enough though stiff as expected and Will be coating the sheath and buffing this with Kiwi clear leather polish. If your looking for a sheath for that vintage fixed knife, Do not hesitate on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Alice F. Meier

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a good quality sheath. Fits up to 5" blade is accurate. Anything longer than 5" blade length will not fit. My blade is 4.25" so its good for me. The only thing I do not like about the sheath is the common snap strap to secure the knife seems too easy to unsnap. But most sheaths have the same set up. Overall a good buy especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: B. Reszel

customer_reviews.title: Great sheath for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I was so concerned to order without seeing. I read the reviews, I measured and remeasured the blade length and the handle diameter to be absolutely sure it would fit. When I received it, I slipped the blade in and it fit like a glove. The snap holding the knife in place was a bit snug, but I knew it would stretch as leather product. I added leather softener, and stored away for the hunting season. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Terese Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Fits my Buck 863 Selkirk
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sheath. Basic leather with solid rivets spaced around the edges. I have the polymer, survival sheath that also holds my fire starter rod for my Buck Selkirk 863, but it just isn't the same as leather. I'll just throw the flint rod into my go bag and use it when needed. This sheath is nice, but I had to get it wet to mold it to my handle and get the snaps to go over the handle. Definitely worth the money and then some.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia McGee

customer_reviews.title: ... I have of this length the leather was of good quality. The Leather was stiff at first but ...
customer_reviews.text: It fit several knives I have of this length the leather was of good quality. The Leather was stiff at first but Mink oil and saddle soap has brought it into good softness. One of these sheaths was a Christmas present for the Grandson's skinning knife that we bought without a sheath, he wears it every where at his house.
customer_reviews.author: apachebike

customer_reviews.title: Good for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Sheath works well with a number of my 4 inch knives. It's not very wide so it's important to measure first! I don't think it would work with a skinner. The leather is not too thin or too thick and the snap works well too (no size/retention issues). It was dry and stiff when it arrived but I put some conditioner on it and now it's perfect. Overall a great buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Costello

customer_reviews.title: Quality sheath at a great price!!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality.. never would have known it was used. Fits my WW2 issue knife like a glove. Shipping was very fast. I carry it on my belt every day, spend daylight til dark in the woods or working and it's stood up great. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how this received so many good reviews. This sheath is worth maybe 3 dollars. It looks like a 6 year old kid made it. I wouldn't recommend even at 9 dollars. Just spend the money and get a quality sheath.
customer_reviews.author: Iamadroid

customer_reviews.title: vintage German 4 1/2" blade Matador.. hunting knife
customer_reviews.text: this sheath is a perfect fit, quality exceeded what i thought it would be. oiled with Obenaufs leather oil 3 times, buffed with microfiber cloth. $8.50 for sheath and $10.00 Craigs list for knife. only change made is leather shoe lace @ top of knife handle, doubles security for loosing knife in brush.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not for heavy use.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking sheath. Nice color and pretty good construction. But it's lightweight quality leather won't hold up to much use. A good case of you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Griffin

customer_reviews.title: almost fit  but OK
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 4.5" blade "Western" USA 66 knife I had to relocate the strap though. easy job. great sheath anyway.
customer_reviews.author: ...jerry

customer_reviews.title: perfect holster for a fixed blade knife
customer_reviews.text: I found this knife holster by accident and ordered it. It was the perfect holster for my fixed blade knife.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This is no custom sheath, but it costs under $10. Appears to be a completely serviceable hunting sheath. Some have complained about dry brittle leather. Not mine. I did treat it with Snowseal to condition and waterproof. Buffed out to a low luster and darkened it some but I like that. I am 100% satisfied with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Seems well made
customer_reviews.text: I used this for a sheathless knife. It seems sturdy. It seems durable. It is well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Took a chance and it was well worth it.
customer_reviews.text: A great fit for the Garber knife. Well made and sturdy. Leather is tanned nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Fashioned scales for a couple of Camillus 4" straight edge blades. Perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Very nice construction.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for an old Normark knife that I like, but didn't have a sheath for. This fit like a glove, and is well made.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Gu

customer_reviews.title: Will order more. Dry but easily softened.
customer_reviews.text: Like many others have said it is dry, I put some leather restore on and it’s soft as butter now. Very happy with it will order more.
customer_reviews.author: Thedude

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement sheath
customer_reviews.text: I have a 5 inch fixed blade hunting knife and the buckle in the sheath broke. Instead of spending $20 on a replacement from the company, I got this instead and it works just fine. My only complaint is that the belt loop hangs a little lower than my original sheath, but it just took some getting used to
customer_reviews.author: Clyde J. Messiah Lll

customer_reviews.title: but it looks nice enough and seems to be okay
customer_reviews.text: It is generic, one size fits all sort of sheath, but it looks nice enough and seems to be okay. Upcoming hunting trip will tell more. Just remember, don't leave your knife in leather, pull it out when knife is going into storage.
customer_reviews.author: Jon B

customer_reviews.title: Fits Condor Bushlore and Terava Puukko 110
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price. This 5" sheath Fits Condor Bushlore perfectly. Fits Terava Puukko 110 perfectly but you may need to wet the snap retention and stretch it around the handle an extra millimeter so it snaps.
customer_reviews.author: srvtek

customer_reviews.title: Be sure you use for normal handle will not fit large handle like a stag horn.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality nice workmanship, the retainer will not fit around my stag handled knife but fits around regular handle. 5” knife fits perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Sandie

customer_reviews.title: just fine..
customer_reviews.text: I got it for a knife,that didn't come with a sheath.....it fit fairly well just a little big...thesnap for the handle was way too big,but I think with a little modification,it may work ,just fine..
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my knife. Strong, good looking, protects well and able to put it on a belt if needed during outdoor activity. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, dry leather feels more like cardboard than leather. Yes it is cheap, but I do not expect it to last very long. I have begun looking for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Richard T

customer_reviews.title: Fly with the Eagle
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made quality product. Good stitching reinforced with steel rivits. Heavy leather accented with a subtle basket weave. Easily fit my vintage 5.25" Ka-Bar knife which is going to be congratulatory gift for my grandson when he is awarded is Eagle Scout rank in September.
customer_reviews.author: LSands

customer_reviews.title: Can beat it for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the cost. Could have spent much more and it would not fit and protect my knife any better.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very well made!
customer_reviews.text: If there is one thing the have always done well in Mexico it is leather goods. This is a very well made sturdy sheath which fits my knife like it was made for it. For a sheath of this quality you can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: vinnyz

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality even at this price. Rusted blade after two days in sheath.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Nice for the price. Stiff, but breaks in, used some oil on it.
customer_reviews.author: Chaz

customer_reviews.title: Make sure your knife isnt too big.
customer_reviews.text: It didnt fit my Benchmade fixed contego at all. The sheath that came with my knife works great tho, idk why people say its small and chips the blade.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Barber

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as scheduled and packaged appropriately. Knife fits perfectly in it and it’s exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Michaela L Woodcock

customer_reviews.title: Durable and strong
customer_reviews.text: Husband needed a new sheath for his knife and I ordered this one. The size was a perfect fit and it’s durable. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: S Smith

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Value and Qualtity
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Durable. I own 3 now for for my various camp knives. 5 stars for quality and value. Functional and beats $50 + for alternative. Highly recommend. I used a product called Leather CPR to soften and mold to blade shape.
customer_reviews.author: J. Jansen

customer_reviews.title: My husband recently lost the original sheath to his knife ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband recently lost the original sheath to his knife during a hunting trip. He ordered this as a replacement and it works perfectly
customer_reviews.author: F. Gast

customer_reviews.title: Fast Shipping!
customer_reviews.text: Just as pictured, good for a 4in blade. A little tight for a thicker blade. Well crafted!
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Cheap looking, cheap price, but lasts and does it’s job!
customer_reviews.author: MIKE

customer_reviews.title: Nice leather
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed, although the snap closure is a tad short so it only snaps closed around the blade rather than the handle
customer_reviews.author: NBGardener

customer_reviews.title: Not bab
customer_reviews.text: The sheath fit my NW Ranger just perfect. Its put togehter niclely. I woiuld order another one from them if i needed it.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Bought this to replace a terrible nylon sheath my SOG came with
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a terrible nylon sheath my SOG came with. It's a fine product. I am satisfied with it's quality. The leather itself does feel a bit dry, but don't expect "full grain leather" quality for this price. It's fully functional, and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: NickG

customer_reviews.title: Powwy
customer_reviews.text: A bit loose on a Morakniv but hasn't lost my knife yet, better than the stock sheath
customer_reviews.author: Fineness

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Average quality, Leather quality fair, had one rivet that the backing was missing. Inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: GWR

customer_reviews.title: Quality case
customer_reviews.text: Well made knife case, top quality at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: ROD

customer_reviews.title: Need to give a tender care yourself to be the greatest
customer_reviews.text: After mink oil treatments, it looks beautiful and feels like it will last forever. Otherwise, way too dry and ready to crack or tear.
customer_reviews.author: gotsushi

customer_reviews.title: Mostly for show....
customer_reviews.text: This isn't a horrible sheath , but I would imagine its mostly for "show". Not great for a blue collar worker that has to pull out a blade a lot, synthetic leather and cheap rivets but...you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: Jermaine miller

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for 5” blade, good quality.
customer_reviews.text: This sheath fits a 5” blade perfectly. I’m very pleased with the quality and fit.
customer_reviews.author: Rocket

customer_reviews.title: Very good deal
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best scabbard for the price. Accurate listing for size and physical description.
customer_reviews.author: jbron

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are a great buy!! Can’t beat the price and quality seems great. If your looking for a universal sheath, look no further!! Wish they made LH.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wellmade
customer_reviews.text: It fit the 5” inch Russell Green River knife perfectly and and is well made
customer_reviews.author: chuck

customer_reviews.title: Good quality buy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a 70 year old KaBar hunting knife that was my dads which I still use. The fit was good for a non custom made sheath. Workman ship is good as is leather quality and basket weave. The leather is dry so plan on soaking it with at least 4 or 5 coats of saddle oil. This will soften it up as well as give it a rich dark brown color. For the money you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: LARRY LABAHN

customer_reviews.title: This sheath gets a 5-start review because the price matched ...
customer_reviews.text: This sheath gets a 5-start review because the price matched the quality, which is okay. I have higher quality sheaths, but at a much higher price.
customer_reviews.author: John H.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for price.
customer_reviews.text: Good knife sheath, was exactly what I needed. Good quality for price.
customer_reviews.author: ELK

customer_reviews.title: This fit perfect. Good price
customer_reviews.text: Needed a stealth for an old military issue survival knife as the original deteriorated. This fit perfect. Good price, quick delivery. All is well. Just a simple knife sheath, no frills. Fit my need perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Michael H.

customer_reviews.title: I bought it for a 4" knife with an odd shaped blade and it works great for it
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be heavy duty. I bought it for a 4" knife with an odd shaped blade and it works great for it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason C.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality leather sheath for your fixed blade knife, well made and will except various length blades, and for the price this is about the best leather sheath money can buy.
customer_reviews.author: Don in Va

customer_reviews.title: Does the job for a really good price
customer_reviews.text: Does the job for a really good price. I followed the advice given in previous reviews and applied some neatsfoot oil to soften it up prior to use. The leather was then able to conform to my knife and create a nice fit. The oil also darkens the leather a bit and makes it look really nice!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good sheath for the money
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed to replace the sheath on my father's old hunting knife that the the dog chewed. If fit perfectly, and was reasonably priced. I checked around locally and everyone told me that I would have to have someone hand make one to fit at considerable expense. My knife blade was 4 1/2 inches long, kind of Bowie knife shaped blade and it fit fine. It even looked like the one it replaced. Totally satisfied
customer_reviews.author: B. Nappi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sheath. Works really well for my Mora knife. It does need some leather oil as mine showed up really dry
customer_reviews.author: Pika boo

customer_reviews.title: Pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Decent leather and fit an older Marbles Fieldcraft blade. Pleased.
customer_reviews.author: The T's

customer_reviews.title: Quality workmanship.
customer_reviews.text: Old knife from the early 60s needed a new sheath. The pictured knife has a 4 1/2 inch blade. The sheath could have handled 5 inches easily. Quality workmanship. Good leather. Real value for 8+ bucks.
customer_reviews.author: John Todd

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: What's not tol like? Hand tooled, thick leather sheath, brass riveted, ample belt lope.
customer_reviews.author: Lonesome Dove

customer_reviews.title: Great sheath, sturdy, thick leather.
customer_reviews.text: Thick leather, well made, looks good. I will order another. Could be improved slightly if the belt loop were made a bit smaller, to secure it when I pull out my knife. Great product for crazy low price.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kauper

customer_reviews.title: Good Bargain
customer_reviews.text: Just as I needed. Knife fits perfectly. Belt loop is a little too large.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Allred

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sheath, fit my knife well, doesnt smell, and, as far as i can tell, its made with real leather. Great if youre going for the old western look.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson E.

customer_reviews.title: Nice sheath but snap strap too tight and needs to ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice sheath but snap strap too tight and needs to be stretched to fit the handle. Leather was super dry and needed several coats of leather oil. With a little love it's a great sheath.
customer_reviews.author: Zach L.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. Would I buy it again. Yes, and will if the need should occur again.
customer_reviews.author: Gone Fishing

customer_reviews.title: Knife Sheath for 5 inch knives
customer_reviews.text: This knife sheath fits the Rattler Saddle Bag knife real well. Also looks real Awsome with the black with Red stripe on the handle. Plenty of room for wide belts. Very good knife sheath!
customer_reviews.author: Conrad DuBois

customer_reviews.title: Nice leather sheath made in Mexico
customer_reviews.text: Good sheath for the money oil it up and it looks quite nice for that knife you have no sheath for
customer_reviews.author: K. MARTIN

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little large for the knife I have, but it will do after I modified the snap.
customer_reviews.author: Rufus K.

customer_reviews.title: protects my knife
customer_reviews.text: did not quite fit needed to be 2 inches longer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Fits perfectly on my German knife which dates back to the early 60’s.
customer_reviews.author: gkp

customer_reviews.title: Becker BK-17 solution
customer_reviews.text: Simple basic leather sheath. Fits a becker BK-17 perfectly. If you dont like the gigantic becker nylon sheath, buy this.
customer_reviews.author: MKO

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sheath!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sheath for my dad for Christmas and he loves it. It seems to be very durable and displays excellent workmanship. You can't beat the price, either! It makes a great gift, and the seller ships promptly. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: AMD89

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: My Bk16 fit perfect in it and it seems to be a decent sheath.
customer_reviews.author: Redbear

customer_reviews.title: Good quality with good stitching
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Stitching is good. Fits the knife I got for Christmas well. Length of sheath is spot one
customer_reviews.author: Gary T.

customer_reviews.title: Well made and fits good.
customer_reviews.text: Fits my new Case knife perfectly. The sheath, with its wrap strap snap, is far preferable to the one Case provides.
customer_reviews.author: James W.

customer_reviews.title: ... than what i needed it for but it was good
customer_reviews.text: a little smaller than what i needed it for but it was good quality
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Not able to return this item
customer_reviews.text: Not satisfied sheath does not accommodate my blade. Unable to return this item NOT FAIR!! Need better product and better return policy
customer_reviews.author: nixinder bajwa

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks pretty decent for a sheath under 20 bucks. A1 1/4 x 4 1/2 blade fits nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Tatum A Combs

customer_reviews.title: ... item for my dad for Christmas loves it works great with the knife hes had for what seems like ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item for my dad for Christmas loves it works great with the knife hes had for what seems like forever.
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: Leather Sheath
customer_reviews.text: It is well constructed and looks great. It was the perfect size for my 4" hunting knife.
customer_reviews.author: LHA

customer_reviews.title: Used some leather conditioner to make it perfect.
customer_reviews.text: quality sheath ... just what i needed. no made in china stamp here. Used some leather conditioner to make it perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Aron Kele

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The sheath was better than advertised. Well made, perfect fit and the price was great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: I bought two. One for my Esee 4 and the other for my BK16. They both fit fine.. and for $25 for two decent Leather sheaths..why not.
customer_reviews.author: justin

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy for SCHF56L.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my new SCHF56L, but it knife is too thick and doesn't snap. Product is good, I'll keep it for another knife that fits it.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Good quality leather & well made
customer_reviews.text: Good quality leather & well made. Excellent value for the money. Fits my 5" bush knife like a glove. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: A.G.

customer_reviews.title: Very well made.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Fit my knife perfectly. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: JEFF MCGURK

customer_reviews.title: fits like a glove
customer_reviews.text: Wet it down and put my knife in. After it dried, fits like a glove. Been needing this sheath for an old Schrade knife for a long time. Looks like it will work well. Pleased with this product so far.
customer_reviews.author: ualawdude

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for Buck knives
customer_reviews.text: Well made sheath for my Buck knife, and it fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: S. Ferrero

customer_reviews.title: Great sheath
customer_reviews.text: Quality sheath for sure! Looks beautiful with my knife also!
customer_reviews.author: nate

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice sheath. Nothing fancy but fits my mora bushcraft perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Grant B.

customer_reviews.title: Regifting is a good thing
customer_reviews.text: A this sheath was for a knife that had belonged to my husband and was re-gifted to our grandson
customer_reviews.author: Maxi

customer_reviews.title: Great sheath
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a 5 inch blade. Fits perfect built solid
customer_reviews.author: G. Henley

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I like this. It is elegant and made of good leather. I do not think you will be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Rose

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good quality leather. great price. fit my 4" blade perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Howie

product_meta.title: Straight Knife
product_meta.description: Brown basketweave leather. Fits up to 5" blade. Crafted from the highest quality materials. Built for performance and durability. Made in Mexico
feature_bullets: Crafted from the highest quality materials
